title: WHAT IS FRIFTR
subtitle: Friftr ( pronounced 'thrift-er' with an 'F' ) is a platform designed to help people find and share better AND cheaper alternatives to overpriced products.

title: SEARCH FOR DEALS
subtitle: Search for the best budget ____ or alternatives to whatever costs too much!

title: ADD YOUR OWN DEALS
subtitle: Everyone is an expert at saving money on something. It could be your hobby, a project you learned from the hard way, or it could be something you can't stop telling everyone you meet! This is the best place to work together and spread the word on a good deal!

title: QUALITY CONTROL
subtitle: We have built in tools to make sure only the best comes through. We'll take care of any garbage.

title: POWERED BY AMAZON
subtitle: Friftr runs on the Amazon affiliate program. Every item on here links directly to Amazon as a referral link, providing us a small percentage of any sales purchased from Amazon by our referral. This business model lets us self-sustain this platform without the influence of paid promoters, sponsors, or other outside influences. We don't think that's cool, we think saving money is.
